content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0) with drop position (-17.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-17.0, -51.0)
- Both drill and furnace contain 3 coal each
- System is working but drill waiting for space in destination
- Furnace contains 7 iron plates

### Copper Plate Production at (-21.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-21.0, -73.0) with drop position (-20.5, -71.5)
- Stone furnace at (-20.0, -71.0)
- Both drill and furnace contain 3 coal each
- Furnace contains 7 copper plates
- System is working but drill waiting for space in destination
- Iron chest at (-17.5, -70.5) for storage

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-14.5, 15.5) facing UP
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) containing 2 coal
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components
- Electric pole network connecting broader system
System status:
- Fully operational with water and steam flowing
- Boiler at full output capacity
- Steam engine generating power

### Research Facility
- Lab containing 5 automation science packs
- Research for automation technology completed
- Connected to power network

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Collection Issues
- Move within reach of resource before attempting to harvest
- When mining coal patches, systematically try different positions until finding reachable spot
- Ensure character is at correct coordinates for resource collection

### Entity Placement Issues
- Check inventory for required entity before attempting placement
- Verify placement position is clear and within reach
- When placing chests next to entities, ensure you have the chest item in inventory

### Recipe and Crafting Issues
- Even after research is completed, some recipes may need manual enabling
- Verify you have all required ingredients before attempting to craft
- For items requiring wood (like wooden chests), gather raw wood first as it cannot be crafted

### Entity Extraction Issues
- Move directly adjacent to entity before attempting extraction
- Verify entity contains the item you're trying to extract
- When extracting from drills/furnaces, ensure you're targeting the correct entity position

### System Management
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in all burner entities
- Keep track of inventory resources for crafting
- Handle "waiting for space in destination" warnings by placing appropriate storage solutions

### Research Management
- Don't attempt to restart already completed research
- Track research progress accurately
- Ensure lab has required science packs for research

### Crafting Prerequisites
- Check if recipes are unlocked before attempting to craft
- For items requiring sub-components, ensure all prerequisite recipes are available
- Verify you have sufficient raw materials for all crafting steps
